name: Haunted Manor: Halloween's Uninvited Guest Collector's Edition
name_original: Haunted Manor: Halloween's Uninvited Guest Collector's Edition
description:
Haunted Manor: Halloween's Uninvited Guest Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Eipix Entertainment. It was originally released in 2018. It was published by Big Fish Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Haunted Manor: Halloween's Uninvited Guest Collector's Edition is available on PC.
